about_the_game:
Gear up for the ultimate car combat experience with Combat Rally! This fast-paced party game lets you battle with up to 8 players, combining local and online multiplayer seamlessly for endless fun. Whether you’re playing with friends on the couch or connecting with rivals worldwide, the thrill never stops.

Customize your strategy by choosing from a variety of gears—ranging from powerful weapons to track-changing obstacles. As players place hazards on the fly, tracks evolve dynamically, forcing you to adapt and rethink your playstyle every lap. No two races are ever the same!

Combat Rally caters to all skill levels. Opt for smooth, arcade-style driving for casual fun, or ramp up the realism with challenging, physics-driven mechanics that demand precision and skill. The game simulates every aspect of real-world car physics, from tire dynamics and suspension to engines and gearboxes. Drifting, losing grip, or nailing a perfect jump feels authentic, thanks to a sophisticated physics engine that even extends to environmental objects—smash trees, leap over ramps, and dodge collapsing obstacles!

Take the action up a notch with tournaments across multiple tracks featuring unique challenges like jumps, moving bridges, and speeding trains. Races can unfold during the day or night, adding extra layers of difficulty to your strategy.

Combat Rally is the ambitious creation of a single developer, now available in early access. With its blend of chaos, strategy, and evolving features, it’s the perfect game for party nights or competitive showdowns. And with even more updates on the horizon, this is just the beginning of your rally to victory. Are you ready to race?
